issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: In the patch supplied on the jira-1953, I missed running tests for hadoop 2.0, TestBeeLineDriver and MiniMRCliDriver. I am providing a revert patch here so that I can run all these tests and provide a uber patch later but don't want to holdup the community because of this change.
fields.summary: Revert changes checked-in as part of HIVE-1953
